A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: OK\, here we go. I like this film\, but don't love it. Performances are great\, it's visually stunning and there is one scene that is so badass that it is completely silent. However\, the Canto Bight subplot is boring\, Rose Tico makes questionable decisions\, Holdo's insistence on keeping her plan private is kind of silly and I really feel sorry for Mark Hamill. It was fun though. 7/10.
